reviews.review: AWASOME! Best tacticl game for me, But if you prefer more modern games, i would recommend Rainbow six siege.
It's Counter Strike. What's more to say about this game? I know what it is and you know what it is. What? Do you want a side of salt with your fries or something?

[H1] CSGO [/H1]
CSGO is the most serious and unserious shit ive seen in a while, i myself have never run into a obvious cheater and i can thank valve for that. It requires a lot of skill, and getting shit talked by Russians. With that being said i recommend you at least try this master piece at least once before i say something about it.
